name: ExpressibleByStringInterpolation
desc: A type that can be initialized by string interpolation with a string literal that includes expressions.

items.name: associatedtype StringInterpolation
items.desc: The type each segment of a string literal containing interpolations should be appended to.

items.name: init(stringInterpolation: Self.StringInterpolation)
items.desc: Creates an instance from a string interpolation.
